body:
Comment 8 by **siyabonga.dlamini**: 
Thanks Alex, this solved my issue, was not aware.

But, now I get "goinstall: installing runtime: command "gomake" not found in $PATH"

Don't know if you can help...

I see gomake is a bash script on windows, seems the Windos port does not chnage this to
bat.
The only thing I could find on the web was on this thread:
http://groups.google.com/group/golang-dev/browse_thread/thread/3c33edfc4100ec5f/5e39f75f9c3f6cc2?show_docid=5e39f75f9c3f6cc2

Sorry, trying out go on Windows for the first time.

Thanks
Siya
